bibl.title: Stesichorus' Althaia: P. Oxy. LVII. 3876. frr. 1-36.
bibl.note: The identification of the Meleager story in P. Oxy. LVII, 3876 is made possible by frr. 2, 6f. and 4. "My aim is to flesh out as far as possible what we might now see of Stesichorus' treatment of Althaia and of her place in this story."
bibl.seg: GARNER Richard, Stesichorus' Althaia: P. Oxy. LVII. 3876. frr. 1-36.

The identification of the Meleager story in P. Oxy. LVII, 3876 is made possible by frr. 2, 6f. and 4. "My aim is to flesh out as far as possible what we might now see of Stesichorus' treatment of Althaia and of her place in this story."
